class.name: PIXI.PolyK
class.help: Based on the Polyk library http://polyk.ivank.net released under MIT licence.\nThis is an amazing lib!\nSlightly modified by Mat Groves (matgroves.com);

public.name: Triangulate
public.help: Triangulates shapes for webGL graphic fills.

private.name: _PointInTriangle
private.help: Checks whether a point is within a triangle

parameters.name: px
parameters.help: x coordinate of the point to test

parameters.name: py
parameters.help: y coordinate of the point to test

parameters.name: ax
parameters.help: x coordinate of the a point of the triangle

parameters.name: ay
parameters.help: y coordinate of the a point of the triangle

parameters.name: bx
parameters.help: x coordinate of the b point of the triangle

parameters.name: by
parameters.help: y coordinate of the b point of the triangle

parameters.name: cx
parameters.help: x coordinate of the c point of the triangle

parameters.name: cy
parameters.help: y coordinate of the c point of the triangle

private.name: _convex
private.help: Checks whether a shape is convex
